input_text:
Job Title: Sr. Citrix Systems Engineer

Location: Nashville Metropolitan Area

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Title: Citrix Systems Engineer Company: Award winning financial institution headquartered in Nashville, TNLocation: Nashville, TN area (hybrid role)Type: Full-time / Perm position Compensation: Lucrative compensation and full benefitsPosition Id: 1709
Discover a true career growth opportunity! … 
Excellent opportunity to join a solid and fast growing financial industry leader with an amazing company culture and career growth opportunity. As their senior Systems Engineer focused on Citrix, you'll play a key role in driving the company’s IT infrastructure. Excellent compensation and benefits package.
The Role:Dynamic role that will provide hands-on management of the company’s IT infrastructure. In this role, you will be handling implementation, configuration, and administration , and technical support of all things related to Citrix. The role will focus on Windows Server 2008-2016, AD, Citrix, VMware, SAN, minor LAN/WAN/WLAN changes, MS Exchange, anti-virus, patching, firewalls and related IT infrastructure needs. You will also be working with other internal and external support resources. 
Key Benefits of the Position: Solid, profitable, and fast growing national financial institution Repeated voted one of the best companies to work for in the Nashville areaExcellent career growth opportunity; focused on cutting edge technologiesAmazing family oriented company culture, with low employee turn-over Excellent compensation and benefits package (plus relo available).
Requirements:The ideal candidate will have experience in many of the following areas:Must have 7 or more years of hands-on experience in as a Systems Admin or Systems Engineer providing support for IT on premise and cloud infrastructure systems. Experience with Citrix administration (1912 Ltsr +), PVS, MCS, Azure/Citrix Cloud. Must have 7 or more years experience in advanced support of Citrix administration, PVS, MCS, Windows server 2016-2022, VMware, Active Directory, LAN/WAN/WLAN knowledge, and storage. Also Citrix ADC, MPX, VPX NetScaler deployment, maintenance, and troubleshooting. The role will involve designing and deploying Citrix virtualization infrastructure and future Citrix Cloud solutions on Azure. Manage user profiles and application delivery. Hybrid role: Must be OK with being onsite two days per week. 
Company:Voted one of the best places to work in middle TN (excellent company culture and stability)Industry leading company… is rated one of the top banks in the state and nation.Office located in historic suburb town of Nashville. 
If this sounds like you, Contact me: 
Contact:Karel LukasThe Trevi Groupkarel@thetrevigroup (dot) com
---------------------------------------------About THE TREVI GROUP: The Trevi Group is part of the MRI Network, a leading global search firm with over 250 offices worldwide, and has been recognized by FORBES as one of the best " Executive Search Firms" for the last seven years in a row. keywords: citrix system admin engineer windows server ad active director active director netscaler pvs mcs powershell hypervisor infrastructure server storage vmware SAN firewalls #thetrevigroup

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level

Implementation, configuration, and administration of Citrix
Technical support of all things related to Citrix
Handling Windows Server 2008-2016, AD, Citrix, VMware, SAN, LAN/WAN/WLAN changes, MS Exchange, anti-virus, patching, firewalls and related IT infrastructure needs
Working with other internal and external support resources
